product_name: LAMO Flower Sheepskin Boots - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Even if it gets cold outside, the LAMO Flower Sheepskin boots help little feet feel cozy thanks to natural sheepskin linings and mid-calf coverage. Suede uppers; pull-loops help provide easy on/off. Plush sheepskin linings insulate while remaining breathable, ideal for cool or warm days. EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and support. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles provide durability and traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Even if it gets cold outside, the LAMO Flower Sheepskin boots help little feet feel cozy thanks to natural sheepskin linings and mid-calf coverage.
